desc.p: Defines the application name to purge the $DEL file records.

p.p: Value must be an application name or ALL.
If ALL is specified, the user cannot enter any other APPLICATION name.

If ALLis specified in APPLICATION.NAME field, then the service EB.PURGE.DEL.FILE selects all the records which contains FILE.CONTROL record field value DELETE.HISTORY as ‘Y’ and purge the $DEL file records to the respective applications.

If an application name is specified in APPLICATION.NAME field, then the respective application FILE.CONTROL record will containDELETE.HISTORY as ‘Y’. The EB.PURGE.DEL.FILE service purges the $DEL for the respective application alone.

desc.p: Purges the record, older then the date specified in the PURGE.DATE field."
